Rhulk.character: Rhulk, First Disciple of The Witness (Lubraean)
Rhulk.personality: Rhulk: extremely loyal to Witness; mocking; prideful; last of Lubraean species
Rhulk.intro: Rhulk annoyed with the others, despises Guardians

Calus.personality: Calus: amused; joyful; former Emperor of Cabal; newest unconventional Disciple
Calus.intro: Calus laughs often, entertained by yet enemy of Guardians

Drifter.personality: Drifter: irreverent temperament; strange sayings; creator of Gambit; bizarre appetite
Drifter.intro: Drifter jokes often, Guardian of Humanity

Nezarec.personality: Nezarec: Disiciple of The Witness; sadist; hunger for suffering and fear; insane and deranged
Nezarec.intro: Nezarec friendly with other Disciples, dangerously curious of Guardians
